original_title: Jon Lord - Beyond The Notes Live
overview: Beyond The Notes Live is a live performance of Jon Lord and band, recorded on 5 October 2004 at the Vulkanhalle (Cologne, Germany). Amongst others the following artists participated: Frida, Sam Brown, Miller Anderson and the Trondheim Solists.  The concert is released on DVD by EMI during the fall of 2004.
title: Jon Lord - Beyond The Notes Live
